content.question: The author's strategy in the first two sentences is to

choices.label: flatter those who would criticize popular opinions
moralize about the injustices present in society
build a logical argument and support it with facts from history
promote an impression of sympathy with public preferences

content.answer: promote an impression of sympathy with public preferences

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
